Articles.Content:
Greetings,

I was wondering if there is a way to put meshes out of Kerbin, for example Alien buildings on other planets or abandoned ships in mid space? Because I am planning on building a galaxy. And would love to build models for more exploration when on planets or mid space.

With regards,

NeoCrawler
You can use the KerbalConstructs plugin, which allows you to place buildings and other things on planets (and even in Space, but I am not sure there).
Thanka alot will take a look into that
